channel.title: Kgpg editor copy-paste problem
channel.description: Hey,some problem in editor in kgpg to decrypt the message,when password window is opeping i cant paste password from copied txt file,using Whonix 13,just a small problem,but maybe someone have similar. Thanks.

item.title: Kgpg editor copy-paste problem

item.description:
Yes i know,i dont even have ~/.gnupg/gpg-agent.conf file in 13 Whonix,maybe there is some solution with kde system settings?

item.title: Kgpg editor copy-paste problem

item.description:
Good day,
